Finance Shared Service Centre (FSSC)
Group Finance and Technical Specialisms
Close navigation
Group Finance and Technical Specialisms

Group Finance and Technical Specialisms

Responsible for setting the financial strategy, scanning the horizon and ensuring that the business has a consistent and sound medium-term financial plan.

  • Group consolidation
  • Comms and training
  • Corporate reporting
  • Finance timetable, guideline and recharges
  • Forecasts
  • Audit management
  • Finance policy & procedure
  • Statutory reporting
  • Overhead base
  • Tax, treasury, audit, insurance systems
  • 3rd party relationship management
  • BOOST
  • Controls and compliance
  • Risk management
  • Technical updates
